fields.name: Merlot
fields.description: A smooth, medium-bodied red wine with notes of black cherry, plum, and cocoa. Known for its soft, approachable tannins.

fields.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: A full-bodied red wine with rich flavors of blackcurrant, blackberry, and subtle hints of spice and oak. It has a long, robust finish.

fields.name: Pinot Noir
fields.description: A light-bodied and elegant red wine, showcasing delicate flavors of cherry, raspberry, and earthy undertones. It's highly versatile for food pairings.

fields.name: Chardonnay
fields.description: A crisp and refreshing white wine with flavors of green apple, citrus, and a subtle mineral finish. It is unoaked for a clean profile.

fields.name: Sauvignon Blanc
fields.description: A vibrant and zesty Sauvignon Blanc with intense notes of passionfruit, gooseberry, and a hint of fresh-cut grass. It is crisp, refreshing, and has a clean finish.

fields.name: Riesling
fields.description: An aromatic white wine known for its high acidity and strong floral and citrus aromas. It can range from bone-dry to very sweet.

fields.name: Champagne
fields.description: A classic sparkling wine from the Champagne region of France, celebrated for its fine bubbles, high acidity, and complex notes of brioche and apple.

fields.name: Prosecco
fields.description: A popular Italian sparkling wine with a light, fruity profile, often featuring notes of green apple, pear, and citrus. Perfect for an aperitif.

fields.name: Cava
fields.description: A crisp and versatile Spanish sparkling wine with flavors of lemon, toasted nuts, and a clean, effervescent finish. It's made in the traditional method.

fields.name: Grenache
fields.description: A dry, fruity rosé with flavors of strawberry, cherry, and subtle spice. It's full-bodied and well-balanced, making it great with food.

fields.name: Syrah
fields.description: A savory rosé with a deep color and notes of red fruit, olive, and herbs. Its complexity and structure pair well with richer dishes.

fields.name: Sangiovese
fields.description: A light and refreshing Italian rosé with bright acidity and flavors of cranberry, raspberry, and a touch of rose petal. It's a great warm-weather wine.
